headline: Microchip Technology (MCHP): Reassessing Valuation After Upgraded Guidance and Analyst Targets Meet Softer Chip Sentiment
summary: Microchip Technology (MCHP) just raised its third quarter guidance on stronger bookings and backlog, yet the stock slipped as broader semiconductor weakness dragged sentiment, creating an interesting disconnect between fundamentals and share price. See our latest analysis for Microchip Technology. Those guidance and product announcements are landing in a market that is still cautious on semiconductors, so Microchip’s roughly 28 percent 1 month share price return and modest 1 year total...
